summary: A bounty hunter name Amen is hired by a group of nuns to recover stolen money. The nuns are female desperadoes in disguise, who want the booty pillaged by an outlaw named Catapult and his gang.
cast: Lincoln Tate|Gabriella Farinon|Gianclaudio Jabes|Gilberto Galimberti|Luigi Bonos|Clara Colosimo|Franca Maresa|Suzy Monen|Sandro Scarchilli|Lorenzo Piani|Francesco D'Adda|Carlo Monni|Serafino Profumo|Omero Capanna|Giglio Gigli|Marcello Meconizzi
